title: Headlines, TNF Preview, & NFL Pep Talks
itunes:title: Headlines, TNF Preview, & NFL Pep Talks
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal, and Colleen Wolfe bring you all the latest news from around the league, starting with the aftermath of the Broncos' loss to the Chargers on Monday Night Football, including an injured Russell Wilson and a bullied Melvin Gordon (5:02). The heroes talk about the injuries to Carson Wentz and Marquise Brown (12:30), Robbie Anderson being added to an already dramatic Cardinals' locker room (15:12), and the Texans parting ways with Jack Easterby (18:55). The crew has pep talks for Commanders fans, Tom Brady, Kyler Murray, and Kirk Herbstreit to help get them through the remainder of this season (31:00). Finally, Week 7 kicks off with the Cardinals hosting the Saints on Thursday Night Football and the heroes make their picks (42:45). 

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
